duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a team of outside B2B account executives and guide their sales efforts to meet targets.
Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to achieve business goals and targets.
Identify growth opportunities and refine strategies based on customer behavior, market trends, and competitor activity.
Provide leadership and support for complex solution sales, including software, hardware, SAAS subscription services, and professional services.
Measure and report on the performance of sales teams and individual account executives, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.
